description: Try our easy to follow Kedgeree recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Kedgeree Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the basmati rice in a saucepan of salted boiling water according to the packet instructions. Drain well.
Place the cod fish in a frying pan with the bay leaves, just cover with water, then simmer for 5-6 minutes until it is just cooked. Drain and flake.
Heat the butter in a pan while the fish is cooking add the onion and garlic and fry for 4-5 minutes until softened. Add the curry powder and continue to fry for 1 minute.
Stir in the rice, fish spring onions, coriander and eggs. Season well with black pepper and heat through until piping hot. Serve immediately.
